title: [CLIENT] Homepage content not loading?
body:
When logged into the client(where I can select 'PLAY' to enter a game queue), the news content is not loading.
I have run the Repair and am still seeing the same issue. My friends say that theirs is displaying though, and I have no issues playing a game. 
Nothing in my network has changed as far as I am aware. 
I am running Windows 7 Home Premium 64 bit.
Clicking 'retry' simply yields a retry, followed by the same error.

EDIT: It started for me on October 5th, in the evening, after clicking a "Skip Waiting for stats" that was taking an annoyingly long time to display.

RESOLVED? : It now appears to be fixed. The issue was still occurring when I logged off at 11pm EST on 10-6-2014. But when I logged in at 1:24pm EST on 10-7, the issue now appears to be resolved.

replies.body: This happen to me today i relaunch lol and still have this issue any solutions?????
Yep, having the same problem here. NA, right? Rito hasn't put up anything so far reporting this problem. it'll probably pass.
i still have this problem, and i can't find a solution

I have this problem from 2 days ago what is wrong?

I repaired it and now it's working.
This has been happening to me for about 3 or 4 days now and has continued with the release of the latest patch.

That's to be expected when your client for some reason can't reach the content server... This may be something with our server, or something with the connection between your client and the server (many possible reasons here). 

Did this fix itself eventually, or are you still seeing this issue?
Looks like it is occurring again. Does the news feed get sent on a different UDP port or something? If not, I'd think this was a server side issue.
It now appears to be fixed. The issue was still occurring when I logged off at 11pm EST on 10-6-2014. But when I logged in at 1:24pm EST on 10-7, the issue now appears to be resolved.

I did a bunch of work arounds, but what seemed to work for me is uninstalling the pando media booster that comes with LoL

I had this problem for months
I'm in the same boat. Client has been lagging horribly for the past 2 nights. Its not my service provider or my computer as far as I've been able to glean from digging around.

Yea I'm having this problem too... not sure why/how it happened... 

I tried disabling my firewall and nothing still, not sure how this happened or how to fix it... Anyone got any suggestions/fixes or ideas as to what the problem might be?

Yeah I've been getting this as well, ever since last night when I was constantly getting the end-of-game screen where it tells me to "Skip Waiting For Stats".

I clicked on that, and the content on the front page hasn't been visible since then, even after restarting the client, and my computer.
